required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Assess Pharmacokinetics, Safety, and Tolerability of XC-8
clinical_study.official_title: Double-blind, Randomized, Dose-escalating, Placebo-controlled Study to Assess Pharmacokinetics, Safety, and Tolerability of XC-8 After Single and Multiple Oral Doses in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The study focusses on the evaluation of safety and tolerability of the XC8. The design of the study involves sequential dosing of cohorts (group of volunteers), taking increasing doses of the product after receiving conclusion and recommendation for further continuation of the study from the Dose Escalation Committee.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Adverse events per treatment arm
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-dose up to Day 36
primary_outcome.description: Adverse events will be summarized descriptively by treatment arm. Verbatim terms will be mapped to preferred terms and organ systems using the current Medical Dictionary for Regulatory Activities version. For each preferred term, frequency counts and percentages will be calculated by cohort.The nature, severity, seriousness, and relationship to study medication will be summarized for all study subjects

Laboratory data (hematology, biochemistry and urinalysis) will be summarized by treatment arm. Changes from pre-dose will be presented using shift tables (employing the categories 'normal', 'abnormal, clinically not significant' and 'abnormal, clinically significant') and absolute changes in laboratory values, if appropriate.

Laboratory data (hematology, biochemistry and urinalysis) will be summarized by treatment arm. Changes from pre-dose will be presented using shift tables (employing the categories 'normal', 'abnormal, clinically not significant' and 'abnormal, clinically significant') and absolute changes in laboratory values, if appropriate.

Laboratory data (hematology, biochemistry and urinalysis) will be summarized by treatment arm. Changes from pre-dose will be presented using shift tables (employing the categories 'normal', 'abnormal, clinically not significant' and 'abnormal, clinically significant') and absolute changes in laboratory values, if appropriate.

Physical examination results will be listed for following: general appearance, skin, head, eyes, ears, nose, throat, neck (including thyroid), lymph nodes, chest, heart, abdomen (including liver examination), extremities, and nervous system.

Physical examination results will be listed for following: general appearance, skin, head, eyes, ears, nose, throat, neck (including thyroid), lymph nodes, chest, heart, abdomen (including liver examination), extremities, and nervous system.
12-lead ECG results will be analyzed descriptively
12-lead ECG results will be analyzed descriptively
Vital signs (blood pressure, respiratory rate, pulse, and temperature) results will be analyzed descriptively.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of XC8 by assessing AUCinf
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and 21 (Pre dose, and 20 min, 40 min, 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours post dose), Day 2 and Day 22 (24 hours ±10 minutes post dose); Day 8 to 11, 13 and 15 (Pre dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve extrapolated to infinity

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of XC8 by assessing Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and 21 (Pre dose, and 20 min, 40 min, 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours post dose), Day 2 and Day 22 (24 hours ±10 minutes post dose); Day 8 to 11, 13 and 15 (Pre dose)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of XC8 by assessing AUC0-tlast
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and 21 (Pre dose, and 20 min, 40 min, 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours post dose), Day 2 and Day 22 (24 hours ±10 minutes post dose); Day 8 to 11, 13 and 15 (Pre dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve up to the last sampling time with a concentration above the limit of quantification

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of XC8 by assessing AUC0-24
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and 21 (Pre dose, and 20 min, 40 min, 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours post dose), Day 2 and Day 22 (24 hours ±10 minutes post dose); Day 8 to 11, 13 and 15 (Pre dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve up to 24 hours after study drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of XC8 by assessing t1/2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and 21 (Pre dose, and 20 min, 40 min, 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours post dose), Day 2 and Day 22 (24 hours ±10 minutes post dose); Day 8 to 11, 13 and 15 (Pre dose)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of XC8 by assessing Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and 21 (Pre dose, and 20 min, 40 min, 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours post dose), Day 2 and Day 22 (24 hours ±10 minutes post dose); Day 8 to 11, 13 and 15 (Pre dose)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of XC8 by assessing λz
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and 21 (Pre dose, and 20 min, 40 min, 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours post dose), Day 2 and Day 22 (24 hours ±10 minutes post dose); Day 8 to 11, 13 and 15 (Pre dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent first order terminal elimination rate constant

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of XC8 by assessing Cav
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 8 to 11, 13 and 15 (Pre dose); Day 21 (Pre dose, and 20 min, 40 min, 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours post dose), Day 22 (24 hours ±10 minutes post dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Average concentration over one dosing interval

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 2 and Day 8 (pre-dose) to Day 22
changes from Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 2 and Day 8 (pre-dose) to Day 22

arm_group.description: Cohort 1: 8 subjects will be randomized in a 3:1 ratio to be treated either with 10mg XC8 (6 subjects) or placebo (2 subjects, see placebo arm)
Cohort 2: 8 subjects will be randomized in a 3:1 ratio to be treated either with 50mg XC8 (6 subjects) or placebo (2 subjects, see placebo arm)
Cohort 3: 16 subjects will be randomized in a 3:1 ratio to be treated either with 200mg XC8 (12 subjects) or placebo (4 subjects, see placebo arm)
Placebo comparator arm consists of 2 subjects in the cohorts 1 and 2 each and 4 subjects in the cohort 3.

facility.name: Karl Landsteiner Institut für experimentelle und klinische Pneumologie, Wolkersbergenstraße 1
Fraunhofer Institut für Toxikologie und Experimentelle Medizin ITEM, Feodor-Lynen-Str.15
